bibl.title: Ἄπολλον (P. Ryl. III 498).
bibl.note: P. Ryl. III, 498 (= Pack2 1652) ultimately finds its way into Austins's Adespota Novae Comoediae section as fr. 278. There is insufficient cause to reject tragedy. Old Comedy cannot be excluded either.
bibl.seg: BRUNNER Theodore F., Ἄπολλον (P. Ryl. III 498).

P. Ryl. III, 498 (= Pack2 1652) ultimately finds its way into Austins's Adespota Novae Comoediae section as fr. 278. There is insufficient cause to reject tragedy. Old Comedy cannot be excluded either.
